summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of King Street from the West side of 1st Avenue South to the west side of 3rd Avenue South produced south et al in the City of Seattle, by grading, paving, sewering, watermains under Ordinance No. 12922, creating Local Improvement District No. 1153 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
